articles.title: Telecom Argentina S.A. Invests in Cloud-Native Infrastructure
articles.summary: In a strategic move to enhance operational efficiency, Telecom Argentina S.A. is migrating key business systems to cloud-native platforms. The transformation is expected to reduce costs and improve scalability.

articles.title: Telecom Argentina S.A. Reports Strong Financial Performance
articles.summary: Telecom Argentina S.A. has reported solid financial results for the quarter, with revenue growth driven by strong performance in core business areas. The company reaffirmed its commitment to investing in technology and innovation.

articles.title: Telecom Argentina S.A. Expands Operations in Europe
articles.summary: Telecom Argentina S.A. is expanding its operational footprint in Europe with new facilities and increased investment. The expansion supports the company's growth strategy and commitment to the region.
